goal.en: "In order to let students to learn and understand the knowledge in the field of Foundry and Metal casting in this course. The information about the foundry/automotive industry will also be provided, which will lead to students‘ interest in casting. It also allows students to have different understandings and concepts and ideas for the traditional automobile industry, for the purpose of opening up this course."
goal.ch: 本課程為了讓學生學習及了解鑄造領域的知識外，也會提供鑄造/汽車產業相關訊息，進而引發學生對於鑄造方面的興趣，對於傳董汽車產業的認識有不同的觀念和想法，為開闢此課程之目的。

content.en: "Introduction to traditional and modern casting methods, introduction of green sand mold materials, introduction of steel/stainless steel, introduction of gray iron/ductile iron, aluminum alloy casting, casting gating system design, casting analysis software, factory visit."
content.ch: 傳統及現代鑄造法介紹，濕砂模鑄造材料介紹，鋼/不鏽鋼介紹，灰口鐵/延性鑄鐵介紹，鋁合金鑄造，鑄造方案設計，鑄造分析軟體介紹，工廠參觀。

textbook.en: "Reference: Foundry(Author：張晉昌 ; 全華) Principles of metal Casting, Authors: Richard Heine (Author), Carl Loper (Author), Philip Rosenthal Castings 2nd Edition, Authors: John Campbell"
textbook.ch: "參考書籍：鑄造學(作者_張晉昌); Principles of metal Casting, Authors: Richard Heine (Author), Carl Loper (Author), Philip Rosenthal Castings 2nd Edition, Authors: John Campbell"
